name: Croin
description: The first blockchain solution with built-in credit functionality. Facilitating global commerce through secure, transparent conditional payments. Croin facilitates trade financing and conditional payment. It has use cases in everyday commerce and a web3 alternative to banking. A straightforward use-case is in trade financing, where crediting between two users can be facilitated. Other use cases are NFT/RWA Validation, Safeguarding Project Delivery, DAO for Boolean Output, & Secure Betting System.
